column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Freakin' awesome. Nuff said. Had the spicy chicken ramen
column3: and sprouting (I think that's what it's called). Also had the chocolate/green tea mochi ice cream and the crispy chicken. Black tonkotsu is out of this world awesome
column4: sprouting ramen and spicy chicken ramen are pretty good
column5: crispy chicken was nothing amazing. Good tho. Green tea / chocolate mochi ice cream was delightful. Awesome amazing experience tho. Went here two nights in a row lol.
